add(Complex) - Method in class complex.Complex

complex - package complex
 
Complex - Class in complex

P

S

setForm(Complex.Form) - Static method in class complex.Complex
Specifies the form for future Complex I/O operations for all instances.

T

toString() - Method in class complex.Complex
Returns the Cartesian or polar form of the Complex number, depending on the current form.
